Sentencas: A low-pressure plasma reactor equipped with a convergent nozzle is used to synthesize cathode materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell applications.
Titulo: Investigation on supersonic gas flow coupled with an inductive low-pressure plasma used for the synthesis of SOFC material

Sentencas: Nitrated precursors dissolved in water are injected by a difference in pressure from each part of a pulsed valve.
Titulo: Investigation on supersonic gas flow coupled with an inductive low-pressure plasma used for the synthesis of SOFC material

Sentencas: When the precursors go through the reactor, water vaporizes due to vacuum and plasma, nitrates are transformed into NOx, while La, Sr, and Mn ions are oxidized by the activated species of kplasma and, finally, La1-xSrxMnO3 is deposited on a substrate.
Titulo: Investigation on supersonic gas flow coupled with an inductive low-pressure plasma used for the synthesis of SOFC material

Sentencas: The nozzle causes a supersonic flow in the reactor leading to high particle velocities.
Titulo: Investigation on supersonic gas flow coupled with an inductive low-pressure plasma used for the synthesis of SOFC material

Sentencas: We have modeled gases flow in the reactor with the FLUENT(R) code in order to quantify the velocity of gases.
Titulo: Investigation on supersonic gas flow coupled with an inductive low-pressure plasma used for the synthesis of SOFC material

Sentencas: Laser Doppler Anemometry (LDA) and Laser Doppler Granulometry (LDG) measurements gave us the velocity, concentration and diameters of the injected particles.
Titulo: Investigation on supersonic gas flow coupled with an inductive low-pressure plasma used for the synthesis of SOFC material

Sentencas: Infrared spectroscopy was used to quantify the conversion rate of precursors into La1-xSrxMnO3.
Titulo: Investigation on supersonic gas flow coupled with an inductive low-pressure plasma used for the synthesis of SOFC material

Sentencas: These techniques have permitted to improve our knowledge on the behavior of sprayed particles in low pressure supersonic plasma reactor.
Titulo: Investigation on supersonic gas flow coupled with an inductive low-pressure plasma used for the synthesis of SOFC material

Sentencas: This set-up has been developed to obtain a perovskite deposited with a controlled chemical composition.
Titulo: Investigation on supersonic gas flow coupled with an inductive low-pressure plasma used for the synthesis of SOFC material
